newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Geneva airport to bar smoking from September.
newsitem.headline: Geneva airport to bar smoking from September.

text.p: Geneva's Cointrin international airport will ban smoking by staff and travellers from September 1 except in designated smokers' zones, the management said at the weekend.
The decision follows a passenger survey last year which found 70 per cent support for a ban coupled with creation of special smoking areas.

A statement said the management was following recommendations of the United Nations' Geneva-based World Health Organisation (WHO), which campaigns widely against smoking, and Swiss government regulations.
